itemDescription: Crop rotation is the practice of growing different types of crops in the same area in sequential seasons. It helps improve soil health, reduce pests and diseases, and increase crop yield.
author: John

itemDescription: Pest management involves techniques to control and eliminate harmful pests in crops. Methods include biological control, chemical pesticides, and integrated pest management (IPM) strategies.
author: John

itemDescription: Efficient irrigation practices are crucial for maintaining soil moisture and ensuring healthy crop growth. Techniques include drip irrigation, sprinkler systems, and surface irrigation.
author: John
